about_the_company: A growing Medical Device company located in Parsippany, NJ.
job_responsibilities: Design and develop digital circuits and schematics using microprocessors.
Work with tools like DX Designer, Altium, etc.
Develop firmware using C programming for microprocessors such as MSP430, TM4C, NXP IMX family.
Implement embedded controllers using microcontrollers for image capture systems.
Collaborate with the manufacturing team to ensure proper documentation and production of products.
Use test tools for signal integrity, EMC, etc.
Provide layout guidance for PCB designers.
required_education: Bachelor's degree in Electrical or Electronics Engineering (or similar)
